Title: All Hail!
RuleTop: Win immediately if you are Cthulhu, otherwise take a Confirmed Not Cthulhu card

Title: Mix It Up
RuleTop: Shuffle the discard pile and draw deck together to form a new draw deck.
RuleBottom: This MAY NOT be played when the Leader and Preacher are performing the Rites

Title: Out of the Shadows
RuleTop: Reveal your loyalty to a player of your choice.
RuleBottom: This MAY NOT be played if any other player has seen your loyalty card.

Title: All Change!
RuleTop: Each player passes their Chaos Card to the player on their left.
RuleBottom: Players with no cards - pass nothing; they may receive a card from another player.

Title: Confusion
RuleTop: Pick two players. They must swap their Chaos Cards.
RuleBottom: You must choose players with a card to swap. If there are none, discard this card with no effect.

Title: Sneak Peek
RuleTop: View the top card of the discard pile, then return it and shuffle the discards.
RuleBottom: This MAY NOT be played when the Leader and Preacher are performing the Rites

Title: Near Future
RuleTop: View the top card of the draw pile, then return the card to the top of the deck.
RuleBottom: This MAY NOT be played when the Leader and Preacher are performing the Rites

Title: Power Grab
RuleTop:
Become nominated Leader.

Nominated Leader returns to its current position after your nomination is resolved.

Title: Forced Reveal
RuleTop:
… players are about to vote.

Choose ONE player — they must choose and reveal their vote before all other players perform the voting step.

Title: Last Chance
RuleTop:
… you are chosen to be sent to the Void of Damnation

— the Current Leader must choose a different player.

Title: Deflected!
RuleTop:
… you are chosen to be sent to the Void of Damnation

— the effect is reversed and the Current Leader is sent in your place.

Title: Self Sacrifice
RuleTop:
… another player is chosen to be sent to the Void of Damnation

— you take their place.

Title: Extreme Privacy
RuleTop:
… another player attempts to view your loyalty

— the investigation is blocked.

You may be investigated later in the game.

Title: Denied!
RuleTop:
… another player is about to have their loyalty investigated

— you prevent the investigation from taking place. They may be investigated later in the game.

Title: Just To Be Safe
RuleTop:
… another player is found not to be Cthulhu.

Investigate that player.

Title: Recast
RuleTop:
… you are the elected Cult Leader.

After drawing three Rites cards while Performing Rites

— you may discard these cards and draw three new ones.
Immediately shuffle the Rites discard pile.
